thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan invited to Dirk Gently’s Holistic Detective Agency after a Twitter exchange with producer
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan invited to Dirk Gently’s Holistic Detective Agency after a Twitter exchange with producer

author: PTI
title: Shah Rukh Khan invited to Dirk Gently’s Holistic Detective Agency after a Twitter exchange with producer
text:
Shah Rukh Khan invited to Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency after a Twitter exchange with producer PTI Feb, 20 2017 10:49:20 IST #Bbc #Buzzpatrol #Dirk gently #Dirk gently's holistic detective agency #Shah rukh khan 
Mumbai: Superstar Shah Rukh Khan has been invited to guest star on season two of American science-fiction series Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency by the executive producer of the show, Arvind Ethan David. 
The BBC drama, based on the Douglas Adams novel series of the same name, centers on the titular holistic detective who investigates cases involving the supernatural. 
It all started when the 51-year-old Bollywood star, who was clueless about the TV adaptation of the popular novel, posted a picture of himself on Twitter writing, "Dirk Gently is a TV series!! And I didn't know it! Woe be upon me. Sorry Adams. The pic is for no apparent reason." Dirk Gently is a TV series!! And I didn’t know it! Woe be upon me. Sorry Adams. The pic is for no apparent reason. pic.twitter.com/K2BWtCQ32a 
— Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) February 18, 2017 
Khan's tweet caught the attention of David, who then gave an offer to the actor to guest star on the show. "Amazing to discover that @iamsrk is a #dirkgently fan. Come guest star in #Season2," he then tweeted. 
This is very happy making! Thank you @iamsrk -- you also didn't know it was made my an Indian! https://t.co/XoIYVnSHb4 — Arvind Ethan David (@ArvD) February 18, 2017 Amazing to discover that @iamsrk is a #dirkgently fan. Come guest star in #Season2 https://t.co/XoIYVnSHb4 
— Arvind Ethan David (@ArvD) February 18, 2017 
In another tweet, an excited David wrote, "Its possible I got a bit too excited that #ShahRukhKhan likes #dirkgently -- do you think he noticed?" 
It's possible I got a bit too excited that #ShahRukhKhan likes #dirkgently -- do you think he noticed? — Arvind Ethan David (@ArvD) February 18, 2017 
The actor was quick to accept the invitation as he posted, "Let me know the time and place. Will figure out my own accommodation!" Let me know the time and place. Will figure out my own accommodation! https://t.co/epmqhSQDIx 
— Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) February 18, 2017 
At last, David locked the deal with his tweet- "Done and done." 
Done and done! https://t.co/URcWq9zG2q — Arvind Ethan David (@ArvD) February 18, 2017 
The show features Hollywood stars Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks and Fiona Dourif.
